content.rendered:
Elder’s Congress 2020 – Revival and Church Growth

Pr. Passmore Mulambo – The Church Elder & Church Ceremonies in Times of Crisis

Annie Machamire – Forgiveness

Hopekings Ngomba – Prudent Financial Management at the Local Church

Pr. Anthony Kent – 21st Century Pastoral Visitation

Pr. Busi Khumalo – Church Manual Provisions

Dr. Kagelo H. Rakwena – Basic Counseling Skills

Caroline Chola – The Role of Women and Children In Church Growth

Pr. Pastor Immanuel Pacheco – Mission Challenge

Pr. Mundia Lywalii – Seven Reasons Elders Should Promote Faithfulness

Dr. Bangwato Sikwa – Impact of Health Ministries on Church Growth

Dr. Alex Llaguno – The HIV Epidemic and the Mission
of the Seventh-day Adventist Church

Pr. Evans Muvuti – Team Work

Dr. Josephat Hamoonga – Efficiency in Planning & Program Management

2020 SID International Bible and Missionary Conference

Dr. Artur Stele – Adventist Interpretation of Apocalyptical Prophesy

Dr. Felix Cortez – The Letter to Hebrews, Significance for Adventist Theology

Dr. Juan Prestol – Finances and the Last Day Events – Being Ready!

Dr. Jeffrey O. Brown – I Can’t Breathe! Keeping the Pastoral Family Alive

Dr. Alberto Timm – Loyalty to the Prophetic Word (English)

Dr. Alberto Timm – Loyalty to the Prophetic Word (Portuguese)
